comp102x.assignment
Class Arrow

java.lang.Object
  comp102x.assignment.Arrow

public class Arrow
extends Object

The Arrow class represents a arrow that can be used to shoot the goals.

Field Summary
(package private)  double pan
          The "left-right" angle for the arrow.
(package private)  double tilt
          The "up-down" angle for the arrow.
(package private)  int xPos
          The current x position of the arrow in the space.
(package private)  int yPos
          The current y position of the arrow in the space.
(package private)  int zPos
          The current z position of the arrow in the space.

xPos

int xPos
The current x position of the arrow in the space. Left for positioning the arrow in future extension.

The current z position of the arrow in the space. Left for positioning the arrow in future extension.
